snippet: The victim, who had gone fishing with a friend, drowned after the 18-foot vessel they were in rolled, the authorities said.
abstract: Authorities say 84-year-old man Anthony Accardo drowns after 18-foot boat he and a friend were in capsizes more than two miles off Staten Island.
lead_paragraph: The victim, who had gone fishing with a friend, drowned after the 18-foot vessel they were in rolled, the authorities said.

headline.main: Man, 84, Dies After Boat Capsizes Off Staten Island
headline.print_headline: Boat Overturns Off Staten Island; Man, 84, Drowns
